summary: The diff shows work toward a file-upload-only avatar flow in TeamMemberFormDialog (uploadImage -> hosted URL stored in formData.avatar with success/error toasts). However, due to truncation, itâ€™s not verifiable that the manual URL input UI and all manual-URL-related logic/validation were fully removed, nor that upload/submit disable protections remain intact. Two non-requested metadata/docs files were also modified with broader/unrelated product descriptions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the manual photo URL input option (the 'Or enter photo URL manually' label and the avatar URL <Input>) from the Team Member create/edit dialog UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt for TeamMemberFormDialog.tsx does not show the form JSX where the label/input would be removed; thus removal cannot be confirmed from the truncated content.

missing_requirements.requirement: No URL validation is performed during submit (do not block submission based on isValidUrl) since manual URL entry is no longer possible.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt does not show the full submit validation logic, nor does it show whether isValidUrl usage (or equivalent URL validation) was removed; cannot confirm from truncated content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove now-unused manual-URL related logic/imports (e.g., handleAvatarChange, URL validation errors for manual entry, isValidUrl import) while keeping upload error handling/progress/preview intact.
missing_requirements.reason: The excerpt shows the new file upload handler, but does not include enough of the file to verify that all manual-URL code paths and imports were removed (and whether any URL-specific validation/error state remains).

missing_requirements.requirement: Upload button remains disabled during upload; submit remains disabled during upload (no regressions).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt defines uploadState.isUploading but does not show the rendered Button components or disabled props; cannot verify behavior due to truncation.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced broad project summaries and unrelated feature descriptions in metadata files (e.g., dashboard language, many component descriptions) not requested by REQ-53/REQ-54.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-53/REQ-54 only request removing manual photo URL UI and cleaning up related logic in TeamMemberFormDialog; changes to repository summary/state files containing unrelated feature narratives are not part of the request.
